subject: Smalltalk was: Re: how to use ExceptionTestCase ?
msgSnippet: ... That s great!  I m in the process of translating ours into Delphi for a client.  I ll be translating it into Smalltalk at some point ... either for a
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Johannes Link" <john.link@g...> wrote:
> > > Yes! If only someone would pay me for programming in
> Smalltalk... :( ;)
> >
> > It seems to me making a comeback.

> You might be right. I recently had to translate my TDD Java training
> to Smalltalk for one of our customers. I'm still waiting for the
> second Smalltak training though.

That's great! I'm in the process of translating ours into Delphi for
a client. I'll be translating it into Smalltalk at some point ...
either for a client or on spec when I have "spare" time.

Dave
